references.reason: This paper introduces the concept of non-stochastic control, which is fundamental to the performative control framework presented in the target paper.

references.paper_title: Performative prediction in a stateful world
references.reason: This paper extends the concept of performative prediction to stateful settings, providing a foundation for the performative control framework proposed in the target paper.

This paper provides the theoretical foundation for handling stochasticity and decision-dependent distributions in optimization problems, which is crucial for analyzing the performative control problem.

references.paper_title: How to learn when data reacts to your model: performative gradient descent
references.reason: This paper proposes the performative gradient descent algorithm, which is adapted and analyzed in the target paper for solving the performative control problem.
This seminal paper introduces the concept of performative prediction and establishes its theoretical foundations, which are essential for understanding the performative control framework.
